name: Pinball Factory
description:
Pinball Factory is a pinball construction set for players to design their own pinball machines. Elements include bumpers, targets, ramps and general design, but also gravity and ball speed can all be set and modified through the interface.

v1.0 of the game contains the default table Wild Fire. The later v1.1 release adds three tables: Darkness, Home Sweet Home and l'Orb.
